field.name: fCylinderRadius
field.desc: The base radius of the cylinder.

field.name: fCylinderRadiusFactor
field.desc: Factor applied to scale the radius over distance

field.name: fCylinderHeight
field.desc: The base height of the cylinder.

field.name: fCylinderHeightFactor
field.desc: Factor applied to scale the height over distance

field.name: fCoverCylinderRadiusMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier Applied to Cylinder Radius Aiming Parameter when player is in cover

field.name: fCoverCylinderHeightMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier Applied to Cylinder Height Aiming Parameter when player is in cover

field.name: fMinDistanceForProximityOverride
field.desc: Enemies closer to the player but further from the screen center will only be considered if this far apart from the current closest target to the screen center.

field.name: fMinDistanceForAnimalProximityOverride
field.desc: Animals closer to the player but further from the screen center will only be considered if this far apart from the current closest target to the screen center.

field.name: fAnimalCylinderRadiusMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier Applied to Cylinder Radius Aiming Parameter when aiming at an animal

field.name: fAnimalCylinderHeightMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier Applied to Cylinder Height Aiming Parameter when aiming at an animal

field.name: fLockOnFollowTime
field.desc: Lock On Follow Time

field.name: fLockOnFadeOutTime
field.desc: Lock On Fade Time

field.name: fLockOnStickRemovalBlendTime
field.desc: Time after being locked on that the stick will be restored. Should ideally be larger than fadeouttime. Only triggered if fadeouttime is set, and is there to prevent jittery caused by fighting between two systems.

field.name: fLockOnHeadRadius
field.desc: Distance from head bone that you mus tbe looking to snap onto the head.

field.name: fLockOnRadiusFactor
field.desc: The lock on radius is scaled by this amount, so that you will no longer be locked on if you move beyond the zone.

field.name: fLockOnHeightFactor
field.desc: The lock on cylinder height is scaled by this amount, so that you will no longer be locked on if you move beyond the zone.

field.name: fLockOnMinDistanceBelowHead
field.desc: The minimum distance below the head that ironsight will snap to.

field.name: fLockOnMinDistanceAboveTorso
field.desc: The minimum distance above the torso that ironsight will snap to.

field.name: fLockOnMaxVariation
field.desc: Max distance reticle will be from target after variation is applied.

field.name: fCoverMaxVariationMultiplier
field.desc: Cover specific Mutliplier :: Max distance reticule will be from target after variation is applied.

field.name: fCoverInaccuracyDistanceMultiplier
field.desc: Cover specific Mutliplier :: The range at which aiming is at the maximum variation and least precise.

field.name: fShootCorrectionHelperStrengthMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier on shoot correction strength.

field.name: fShootCorrectionHelperCylinderMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier on shoot correction cylinder radius.

field.name: fShootCorrectionHelperAnimalVerticalStrength
field.desc: Multiplier on shoot correction vertical strength for animals.

field.name: fShootCorrectionHelperPawnVerticalStrength
field.desc: Multiplier on shoot correction vertical strength for pawns.
